About Glocal Box

Glocal Box is a virtual donation box to help local companies to survive in times of COVID-19.

How does it work?

Glocal Box supports local companies via a dontions. People who own a company can directly register on this platform to receive donations in the future. People who wwant to support their local heroes can directly donate on this platform. This website is here to connect local heroes via one platform.

IMAGE A PLACEHOLDER IMAGE

Get Active!

I own a local company

If you own a local company register now and receive future glocal box donations from their local heroes.

I want to support

If you own a local company register now and receive future glocal box donations from their local heroes.

Vision

Not only local heroes but rather 'massive online shoppers' and large online shopping platforms must make a contribution in times of COVID-19. With the Glocal Box Donation Feature, they can decide how much of their onlien shopping cart value will be donated to a local company. 50% of the donation is paid by the shopper, 50% by the online shop.
